thread.title: Kim Sang Joong Jokes He Finds Working With Yoon Kyun Sang Difficult For One Reason
thread.title_full: Kim Sang Joong Jokes He Finds Working With Yoon Kyun Sang Difficult For One Reason

author: jeeelim5
title: Kim Sang Joong Jokes He Finds Working With Yoon Kyun Sang Difficult For One Reason
text:
Shares 166 Display.Sharethrough.Soompi.1x1 
Actor Kim Sang Joong confessed that he finds it hard to work with Yoon Kyun Sang for one amusing reason. 
The January 29 episode of MBC’s “Section TV Entertainment Relay” featured an interview with the main cast of MBC’s new Monday-Tuesday drama “Rebel: Thief Who Stole the People.” Those in attendance were Kim Sang Joong, Yoon Kyun Sang, Kim Ji Suk , Lee Honey , and Chae Soo Bin . 
Kim Sang Joong is set to play Yoon Kyun Sang’s father in the drama. The younger actor showed gratitude for his senior as he said, “He gave me a lot of confidence.” 
The older actor said, “There was actually something that I was taken aback by while filming this drama.” He had everyone laughing as he jokingly added, “For four episodes, I worked with child actors. I was always looking down for all of my scenes. But [with Yoon Kyun Sang] I have to look up and even tilt my head up to meet his eyes, and it flustered me at first.” 
It isn’t surprising as Yoon Kyun Sang is around 188 centimeters tall (6 feet 2 inches), and seems to tower over everyone! 
Check out the trailer below to get a glimpse of what we can expect from MBC’s “Rebel: Thief Who Stole the People”!
